The data collect primary care practice also assess one two year health outcome ( MACE , procedure complication ) . DOC.brief_title: Clinician Utilization CORUS® CAD Primary Care Provider Decision Making
DOC.criteria: For CORUS CAD arm : Symptoms suggestive obstructive CAD , accord opinion site clinician Age > = 21 year Resulted CORUS® CAD test use evaluation and/or diagnosis symptom suggestive obstructive coronary artery disease ( CAD ) , preferably 1 year prior data collection date . For Control arm : Symptoms suggestive obstructive CAD , accord opinion site clinician Eligible CORUS® CAD ( see exclusion criterion ) Matched CORUS® CAD patient sex , age +/2.5 year , present symptom History myocardial infarction ( MI ) CAD prior index evaluation Presentation high risk unstable angina index evaluation Concurrent systemic infection inflammatory process Concurrent MI acute coronary syndrome Known diabetes mellitus diagnosis laboratory test result suggestive diagnosis diabetes mellitus ( e.g. , HbA1C > =6.5 ) Use steroid , immunosuppressive agent , chemotherapeutic agent , time chest pain presentation
